# uptimekuma_notification_matrix (Resource)

Matrix notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_matrix" "example" {
  name             = "Matrix Example"
  is_active        = true
  homeserver_url   = "https://matrix.example.com"
  internal_room_id = "!abc123:example.com"
  access_token     = "syt_access_token_example"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_token` (String, Sensitive) Matrix access token for authentication
- `homeserver_url` (String) Matrix homeserver URL
- `internal_room_id` (String) Matrix internal room ID
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
